entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Project using MultiPage migrated from Xamarin faults on MAUI #5622
  • [WinUI] Margin not applied for CollectionView items on WinUI #5621
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Shell BackButtonBehavior IconOverride image won't load in iOS #5619
  • If CollectionView is assigned a new handler the header control won't disconnect from the previous CollectionView #5616
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BottomTabs on Android shell is currently recreating the Page Handler with each navigation #5615
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Pinch to Gesture is not working for Content View, when adding it to a scroll view #5614
  • Remove usages of `BackQueue` from `StackNavigationManager` #5613
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Touch scroll is not working in a scroll view when adding pinch gesture to the child. #5612
  • TLS 1.2 in android option (it does not exists in VS Preview 17.1) #5604
  • Shell view is not working properly. #5603

Closed

  • Hot Restart for iOS not working in Preview 17.2.1 #5605
  • RadioButtonGroup.SelectedValue not triggered (windows app) #5298
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • ScrollView grows infinitely inside StackLayout #5442
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • XamlC should optimize CornerRadiusTypeConverter and FontSizeConverter ConvertFromInvariantString #5018
    6.0.300
  • ListView, TableView crashes on windows #5551
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Border control is not updated, while it's width and height changed. #5464
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • opacity is ignored for Image background #5568
  • Problems with Button and ImageButton #5347
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Screenshot (Essentials API) not working in Windows platform #5378
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • WebRTC + MAUI #3394
  • After upgrade to 2022 17.2 Preview 2 margin and padding require XAML format on compile, CSS format works after hot swapping when app is running #5556

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Label.VerticalTextAlignment on Windows #5623
  • [X] Optimise OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️

Merged

  • Reduce the insertion stage timeout to 1 min #5620
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update MacOS Repo Setup Instructions #5525
    area/setup 🪄
  • [X] Compile FontSizeConverter #5338
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Move missing styles over to controls from compat #5617
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] Fix issue updating Border size #5608
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Update MAUI Graphics #5552
    area/drawing ✏️, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] Fix Opacity property in Image #5607
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Housekeeping] Pending ImageButton CornerRadius changes #5610
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, control-button, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Update README.md #5609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Add Microsoft.Maui.Graphics to the MAUI workload #5577
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [android] update to the latest AndroidX packages #5588
    platform/android 🤖, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Improved non-HTTP(S) link handling behavior #5313
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Made MaxLength property consistent across all platforms #5581
    area/controls 🎮
  • Better VSMac workaround #5584
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Clip image to ImageView bounds when using CenterCrop (AspectFill) #5589
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, control-image
